title: Doris Lessing's works
description:
Fiction

Adore
Alfred and Emily
Ben, in the world
Briefing for a descent into hell
Cleft, The
Day Stain died, The
Diaries of Jane Sommers, The
Fifth child, The
Four-gated city, The
Golden notebook, The
Good terrorist, The
Grandmothers, The
Grass is singing, The
Landlocked
London observed
Love again
Making of the Representative for Planet 8, The
Mara and Dann
Marriages between Zones 3, 4 and 5, The
Martha Quest
Memoirs of a survivor, The
Old Chief Mshlanga, The
Old woman and her cat, An
Play with a tiger and other plays
Proper marriage, A
Real thing, The
Report on the threatened city
Ripple from the storm
Sentimental agents in the Voyen Empire, The
Shikasta - Re, Colonised planet 5
Sirian Experiments, The
Stories
Story of General Dann and Mara's daughter, Griot and the snow dog, The
Summer before the dark, The
Sweetest dream, The
Temptation of Jack Orkney, The
This was the Old Chief's country
Through the tunnel
To Room Nineteen

Non-fiction

African laughter
Going home
In pursuit of the English
On cats
Prisons we choose to live inside
Putting the questions differently
Small personal voice, A
Time bites
Under my skin
Walking in the shade

*************************

Remarks

1. To help people download some or all of the above titles, I would appreciate it if you could keep the torrent alive by seeding it for at least an hour after you have finished. Thanks for your co-operation.

2. As of November 8, 2014, the above titles are the only ones listed on Amazon Kindle store, Barnes and Noble Nook bookstore and Kobo Ebook store. (Let us hope that publishers will re-issue some of the author's much earlier works in electronic format.)

3. The above titles are available in epub format only. They are of retail quality.

4. You may wish to use Calibre, a free and open-source software, to convert them to mobi or other formats
